item.title: Gigabit WiFi For Video Streaming
item.description:
WiFi has become the standard wireless connection due to its widespread availability, outpacing technologies like Bluetooth and WiMax. While cellular data is useful in the absence of WiFi, its limited bandwidth and potential for overage charges make it a secondary choice. In fact, data shows that most tablet users don’t even utilize their device’s cellular capabilities. WiFi’s strength is evident in its ability to not only replace cellular broadband but also wired connections...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gigabit-wifi-for-video-streaming/
